refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function provides a way to encapsulate a structure suitable for soap serialization. It accepts a name/value pairs which represents name and value of elements of a structure.

Please note that this is a one of possibilities to express structures for SOAP request/response in Virtuoso/PL. The other way to express structure is to use User Defined Types (see SOAP & WSDL section of the documentation).

refsect2.title: elem
refsect2.para: name which represents name of the member of a structure

refsect2.title: value
refsect2.para: value which represents value of the member of a structure

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para:
The return type of soap_box_structure()
is an array representing a structure.
